scripts.start:dashboard: cross-env ADMIN_PORT=3004 ADMIN_PORT_FALLBACKS=3005,3006 NODE_ENV=production node core/admin-dashboard-server.js
scripts.start:panel: cross-env PORT=55057 PORT_FALLBACKS=55058,55059 NODE_ENV=production node admin-panel/server.js
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n gateway,api,dashboard,panel,auth,integration -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue,red" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:dashboard" "npm run start:panel" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:integration"
scripts.start:all:alt: concurrently -n gateway,api,dashboard,panel,auth,integration -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue,red" "cross-env PORT=8099 npm run start:gateway" "cross-env PORT=5001 npm run start:api" "cross-env ADMIN_PORT=3005 ADMIN_PORT_FALLBACKS=3006,3007 npm run start:dashboard" "cross-env PORT=8081 PORT_FALLBACKS=8082,8083 npm run start:panel" "npm run start:auth" "cross-env PORT=9090 npm run start:integration"
